attributes.action: put martial arts on the curiculum to reduce knife crime !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: add martial arts to the national curiculum in the hope that it may help reduce knife crime in the future and also to increase stop and search powers to include the confiscation of knives and other wepons caried in public places without good cause, also to help with funding for martial arts clubs to make them more accesible for everyone (including adults and the disabled )
